column4: When partitioning my drive for a dual boot system, do I make my "/boot" partition bootable or my "/" partition bootable?
it depends, if you're putting grub in your MBR it doesn't matter
if I didn't put grub on the MBR, I would put it on hda2 (my /boot partition) correct?
good question, i always put grub in my MBR -- i would assume you would put it on your /boot partition though, and make that one bootable
